summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingIGK's best-selling smoothing routine is the ultimate solution for frizz-free, silky, keratin-like hair that lasts for up to 4 days. Prime, protect, and perfect for your smoothest hair ever.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides up to 4 days of frizz controlProvides 450F degree heat protectionSmooth, Keratin-like resultsKey IngredientsSpirulina Protein: Strengthens and nourishes hairCoconut Oil: Enhances shine and delivers an easy slip for detangling without breakageInnovative Bonding Polymers: Mimic the frizz-free, high-shine coating of a keratin treatment when activated by heatFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensSulfatesMineral OilSiliconePEGsItem 2644153How To UseGood Behavior 4-in-1 Prep Spray: Apply evenly to damp, clean hair before your styler and comb through.Good Behavior Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray: Mist over damp hair in sections and comb through, ensuring every strand is thoroughly coated from root to tip.Good Behavior Flexible Hairspray: Mist over dry hair during and after styling and build for more hold and frizz control.Pre-caution: FLAMMABLE. CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE.Avoid spraying near eyes. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 120째F (50째C). Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces - no smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsGood Behavior 4-in-1 Prep Spray: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Silicone Quaternium-8, Spirulina Maxima Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Panthenol, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water, Sambucus Nigra Flower Water, Glycolic Acid, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Trideceth-10, Potassium Sorbate, Polyquaternium-59, Cetrimonium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Cystine Bis-PG-Propyl Silanetriol, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Citric Acid, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, EthylhexylglycerinGood Behavior Spirulina Protien Smoothing Spray: Alcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Butyl Ester of PVM/MA Copolymer, PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, Parfum/Fragrance, Vanillin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Silicone Quaternium-16, Undeceth-11, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Butyloctanol, Undeceth-5, Butylene Glycol, Spirulina Maxima Extract, Arctium Lappa Root ExtractGood Behavior Flexible Anti Frizz Hairspray: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., Disiloxane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaoleate, Spirulina Platensis Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Water (Aqua/Eau), Aminomethyl Propanol, Polyquaternium-59, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), LimoneneShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
